entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Arctic Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:03 p.m. EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 20 overnight. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 4 May 2023
